sentences.en: Being a multi - selling megastar hasn't always been mass adoration and adulation.
sentences.cn: 作为多产的巨星并不总是有大众崇拜和谄媚.

sentences.en: He gazed at her with pure adoration.
sentences.cn: 他一往情深地注视着她。

sentences.en: He is worthy of all your adoration.
Her adoration of Father Ralph had turned into an ardent, very girlish crush.
sentences.cn: 她对拉尔夫神父的崇拜也变成了热爱, 那就是少女的迷恋.

sentences.en: How say and pull to grew adoration to go above?
sentences.cn: 问:咋个又扯到生殖崇拜上头去了?

sentences.en: If I spoke to her , how I could tell her of my confused adoration?
sentences.cn: 要是说了, 怎么向她倾诉我迷惘的爱慕?

sentences.en: In Jing's painting, adoration for soldiers is often mixed with fantasy.
sentences.cn: 在 景氏 的绘画中, 对士兵的崇敬常常是与幻想混和在一起的.

sentences.en: Love is closer anyway and warmer than adoration of some vast unknowable cloud.
sentences.cn: 爱情,比起对巨大而不可捉摸的云雾的崇拜来说,毕竟更加亲切,更加温暖.

sentences.en: My heart will join with yours and bubble over with effervescent adoration.
sentences.cn: 我的心会与其他信徒连结,满心欢喜爱慕上帝.

sentences.en: She is worthy of your adoration.
The females procreation adoration is the origin and return of ancient goddess.
sentences.cn: 女性生殖崇拜是上古女神的缘起和皈依.

sentences.en: the look of adoration in his eyes
The most famous thing is the school's high adoration towards money.
sentences.cn: 学校对金钱的崇拜无疑是最值得骄傲的事.

sentences.en: The phoenix worship of China is fetish worship not totem adoration.
sentences.cn: 中国凤崇拜是灵物崇拜而非图腾崇拜.

sentences.en: There is passion, adoration, in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他两眼满是热情, 喜悦.

sentences.en: Toby turned to look at Jill and naked adoration shone from his eyes.
sentences.cn: 托比转过脸看看吉尔,眼睛里流露出明显的敬慕神情.

words.tran_cn: 可爱的；可敬重的，值得崇拜的
美妙地；可崇敬地；可爱地

trans.tran_cn: 崇拜，爱慕，受崇拜（或爱慕）的对象
